abstract: Nick Davies resigns temporarily as aide to International Association of Athletics Federations president Sebastian Coe amid investigation into emails regarding Russian doping cases.
lead_paragraph: The move by Nick Davies, an aide to Sebastian Coe, is pending an internal ethics investigation into emails linked to Russian doping cases.

headline.main: Aide to I.A.A.F. Chief Steps Down Temporarily

snippet: The move by Nick Davies, an aide to Sebastian Coe, is pending an internal ethics investigation into emails linked to Russian doping cases.
